activities: This certification applies to Shopify Data Processing (USA) Inc., a  U.S. subsidiary of Shopify Inc.  Shopify Data Processing (USA) Inc. provides a variety of hosted ecommerce software and related online services, including  payment processing, shipping and marketing.  Personal information is processed for a variety of purposes related to the particular services provided. For example, personal information is used to confirm user identity, process transactions, process payments, improve services, communicate with users, monitor and mitigate fraud risk, and to comply with applicable legal and regulatory requirements.  Personal information is transferred to third parties for limited purposes and in accordance with Shopify’s Privacy Policy.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All client, customer, partner and website visitor data. Data is both automatically and manually processed.
recoursemech: Data subjects are directed in Shopify's Privacy Policy to contact the Shopify Chief Privacy Officer at privacy@shopify.com.  If the data subject's complaint remains unresolved, data subjects are directed to contact the International Centre for Dispute Resolution®, the international division of the American Arbitration Association® (ICDR/AAA),  at http://info.adr.org/safeharbor/.
